version_description:
• Temporary friends are listed under Followers in the Me tab
• Friends' notifications regarding your location appear in Me > Followers
•  Find My Friends has been updated with an all new design for iOS 7.
• New UI to search for and set location-based notifications (requires iOS 6.1 or later)

• Support for Retina display-capable devices
• Bug Fixes
• Stability enhancements
This version of the Find My Friends app includes support for iOS 8 and allows users to move their friends list to their iCloud account if necessary.

New for iOS 10:

• Support for Find My Friends on Apple Watch

• Stability improvements and bug fixes

New for iOS 10:

• Support for Find My Friends on Apple Watch

• Stability improvements and bug fixes
Bug fixes, performance improvements, and support for iOS 11
